title: New game mode idea thingy
body:
I was thinking of a new game mode:
Basically, the game is restored to what it was like in the early stages. All of the champs are just as broken (and useless) as they were when LoL came out, the map is the same as it was, old splash arts, items, etc. 
I dunno, it just seems pretty cool and an interesting idea to see what the game was like years ago:l

replies.body: i feel like it would take a lot of resources to do that and the size of the patch if it were to be  released would probs be massive but it would be interesting
I guess. It would be like downloading a whole new game again :/
